name: Smartwool Wintersport Mountain Socks - Children to Youths
description: Way more fun than plain black wool. These toasty ski socks are made for young shredders. Tough enough to last through season after season, the Wintersport Mountain Socks have ski-boot-specific cushioning to keep feet comfortable from fresh tracks to last chair.Merino and nylon fabric blend is warm, durable and resists odours.Light cushioning on shin and forefoot are comfortable inside ski boots.Flat-knit toe seam.
